item.title: By: Izgad
item.dc:creator: Izgad
item.description:
I reviewed Betraying Spinoza several years ago. http://izgad.blogspot.com/2006/12/how-to-murder-philosopher-who-has-been.html
How can someone reject Orthodoxy and write a history book that sounds like it was the work of Rabbi Wein's frei sister?
item.content:encoded:
I reviewed Betraying Spinoza several years ago. http://izgad.blogspot.com/2006/12/how-to-murder-philosopher-who-has-been.html

How can someone reject Orthodoxy and write a history book that sounds like it was the work of Rabbi Wein’s frei sister?
